title: Software Engineer
summary: Hey! Welcome to my personal site. My name is Sam, and starting Fall 2020, I'm looking for a new grad developer position. Check out some of interests below.

studies.institute: The University of Maryland - College Park

roles.title: Software Engineering Intern
roles.description: Modernized a web application that visualizes job dependency data (react, nodejs). Preprocessed data for graph database ingestion using Python. Wrote python code to find the final downstream dependency in a project.

roles.title: System Administrator
roles.description: Automated recording of user account data and mass user creation and deletion with shell scripts. Wrote python programs to warn system admins and users of cluster misuse. Updated cluster nodes to Scientific Linux 7.
